Text: Generate a short paragraph about 'human aging' targeting readability level Upper Elementary. Limit the output to 100 words. Human aging is a natural process where our bodies change over time. As we grow older, our skin wrinkles, our hair turns gray, and we may need glasses to see clearly. Inside our bodies, cells age too.
